[File: mempool/src/shared_mempool/priority.rs] [Function: check_peer_metadata_health()] [Microsecond Conversion] Can converting seconds to microseconds (max_sync_lag_secs * MICROS_PER_SECOND) overflow for very large sync lag values? (Medium)

[File: mempool/src/shared_mempool/priority.rs] [Function: update_sender_bucket_for_peers()] [Min/Max Bounds] Do min() and max() operations properly prevent num_top_peers from being 0 or exceeding num_sender_buckets? (Medium)

[File: mempool/src/shared_mempool/priority.rs] [Function: PrioritizedPeersComparator::new()] [Random State Seed] Is RandomState::new() cryptographically secure, or can attackers predict the hash seed to manipulate peer ordering? (Medium)

[File: mempool/src/shared_mempool/priority.rs] [Struct: PrioritizedPeersComparator] [Time Service Consistency] Can different PrioritizedPeersComparator instances with different time_service instances cause inconsistent peer ordering? (Medium)

[File: mempool/src/shared_mempool/priority.rs] [Type: MempoolSenderBucket] [Bucket Range] Are MempoolSenderBucket values properly validated to be within 0..num_sender_buckets range? (Medium)

[File: mempool/src/shared_mempool/priority.rs] [Function: update_sender_bucket_for_peers()] [Magic Number] Is the hardcoded latency slack conversion factor (/ 1000.0) correct for converting milliseconds to seconds? (Low)
